comments.text: 谈钱伤感情只好谈自由了

乌克兰成为有钱世界的英雄？
不，乌克兰成为自由世界的英雄

data.text:
在这场战争的50天里，乌克兰成为整个自由世界的英雄。对于那些有勇气把黑话说成黑话的人来说。对于那些没有被宣传毒害的人来说。你们都已成为英雄。所有经受住并不放弃的乌克兰男人和女人。谁将会赢得胜利。谁会把和平还给乌克兰。我确信这一点。

> During the 50 days of this war, Ukraine became a hero for the whole free world. For those who have the courage to call a spade a spade. For those who are not poisoned by propaganda. You have all become heroes. All Ukrainian men and women who withstood and do not give up. And who will win. Who will return peace to Ukraine. I'm sure of it.

Source: [Volodymyr Zelenskyy's Telegram Channel](https://t.me/V_Zelenskiy_official/1255)


https://bafybeigzty6yspnqrz2w3ykc5ku5i6p7gzdg7e6l7mekty2d4juls6f3m4.ipfs.dweb.link/?filename=20220414_Zvernennya_Eng_Sub_TG.mp4&filetype=video%2Fmp4

#泽连斯基
